member.name: IDWriteFontList.GetFont
member.summary: Gets a font given its zero-based index.
member.param: Zero-based index of the font in the font list.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the newly created object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontList.GetFontCollection
member.summary: Gets the font collection that contains the fonts in the font list.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the current object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontList.GetFontCount
member.summary: Gets the number of fonts in the font list.
member.returns: The number of fonts in the font list.
